org.apache.hama.ml.distance

Interface DistanceMeasurer

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CosineDistance, EuclidianDistance

    public interface DistanceMeasurer
    a DistanceMeasurer is responsible for calculating the distance between DoubleVectors or Arrays of doubles

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double measureDistance(double[] set1, double[] set2)
      Calculates the distance between two arrays of doubles
      double measureDistance(DoubleVector vec1, DoubleVector vec2)
      Calculates the distance between two DoubleVectorss

    • Method Detail

      • measureDistance

        double measureDistance(double[] set1,
                     double[] set2)
        Calculates the distance between two arrays of doubles
        Parameters:
        set1 - an array of double
        set2 - an array of double
        Returns:
        a double representing the distance

      • measureDistance

        double measureDistance(DoubleVector vec1,
                     DoubleVector vec2)
        Calculates the distance between two DoubleVectorss
        Parameters:
        vec1 - a DoubleVector
        vec2 - a DoubleVector
        Returns:
        a double representing the distance
